text: When Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber reunited for a chill session at Selena's L. A. home last week, Abelena shippers groaned with dread while Jelena shippers rejoiced. According to every inside source imaginable, Justin and Selena are just rekindling their friendship, not a romantic relationship, and some sources even said The Weeknd was totally okay with the prospect of the exes reconciling as friends. Well, according to E! News, it turns out Selena and The Weeknd broke up sometime last week and have been discussing their split since the summertime, long before Jelena reemerged as friends.
